group_1.narration: Magical Girls are constantly in danger.
That's something I realized@as soon as I became one.
That's why, once I teamed@up with Yachan... We decided@to trade letters once a year.
Those letters were kind of like our wills.
After all, we never knew when@the other might die without warning.@So we sent letters, just in case, so that@our wishes and dearly-held desires would@be kept in a will to our sole best friend.
I remember the contents of those letters@even now, long after we parted ways.@Every single one of them.
Since my birthday, I've realized that I like@someone. But...I don't know what to do.
We aren't ordinary girls.@So even if this person likes me back,@we may not be able to be together.
I know that, and still...@I wrote a letter to my crush.@I don't want to just pretend I never had@these feelings, even if the worst happens.
But I'm lost on whether I should have@you deliver this letter, should I die.@Getting a letter from a dead girl...@It's unkind to do that to someone. Right?
What would you do in that situation, Mifuyu?

group_1.textCenter: (We should've realized the consequences of@being Magical Girls long ago.)
(I'm in the thick of it now, at this age.)
(My powers are weakening, and I've fallen in@love...)
(I started searching for a way to break free@from being a Magical Girl.)
(And I didn't just want that freedom for@myself...)

group_1.textLeft: (I wonder, though... Is it really okay to@trust the Magius?)

group_1.textRight: [chara:100701:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]Geeze! Mifuyu! Are you listening?!
Reeeally?
In that case, try to solve this. It's a@differential calculus problem.

group_1.narration: Find the derivative of this function.@f(x)=3x(x-6)

group_1.textRight: Ugh! You're hopeless. You need to focus more@on your studies!
Don't forget, I'm the one who made it so you@could leave your house.
And I'm the one who asked my dear Papa to@give you a scholarship from his foundation.
I even got you this house so you could live@here by yourself, you know?
It was SUCH a huge pain to get all that@worked out!
So do try a bit harder with your studies,@please!

group_1.textLeft: By the way, what are you planning to do@after this?

group_1.textRight: After this? Well, you're gonna take a@practice examination first, and then...
Oh, sorry, you weren't talking about @studying. Are you asking about the Magius?
We will increase the number of Feathers and@[textBlue:Rumors], and proceed to capture more Witches.
And thus, expedite the growth of Eve.

group_1.textLeft: Do we need to be in such a rush?

group_1.textRight: The longer we waste, the likelier we are to@run into risks.
If we face fewer risks as a result of rushing@than we do by waiting...
Surely it's better to hurry it along.
Even as we stand here now talking...
There are plenty of girls out there in the@world who are becoming Witches.
Oh! That's right.
We'll be holding our regular meeting to@explain our actions to the Feathers.
I'll see you there, Mifuyu.
